Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers

Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers.AuthController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/auths") public class AuthController extends Object
Controller class for managing authorized persons.

  • Method Details

    • getAuth

      @GetMapping public List<AuthDTO> getAuth(@Valid @Valid AuthFilter filter, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieve authorizations for authorized persons by document number.
      Parameters:
      filter - object with filters.
      page - The page number for pagination (default is 0).
      size - The number of records per page (default is 10).
      Returns:
      list of authorizations.

    • getValidAuths

      @GetMapping("/valid") public List<AuthDTO> getValidAuths(@RequestParam Long docNumber)
      retrieve valid authorizations for authorized persons by document number.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - number of document.
      Returns:
      list of valid authorizations.

    • createAuthorization

      @PostMapping("/authorization") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthDTO> createAuthorization(@RequestBody VisitorAuthRequest visitorAuthRequest, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long userId)
      Authorize visitor with authorized ranges.
      Parameters:
      visitorAuthRequest - request.
      userId - request.
      Returns:
      authorization created.

    • checkAuthorization

      @GetMapping("/authorization/{docNumber}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> checkAuthorization(@PathVariable Long docNumber)
      check if the visitor have access.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - request.
      Returns:
      authorization created.

    • deleteAuthorization

      @DeleteMapping("/authorization") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthDTO> deleteAuthorization(@RequestHeader("auth-id") Long authId, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long userId)
      Deletes the authorization.
      Parameters:
      authId - the ID of the authorization to delete
      userId - the ID of the user requesting the deletion
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the deleted AuthDTO

    • activateAuthorization

      @PutMapping("/authorization/activate") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthDTO> activateAuthorization(@RequestHeader("auth-id") Long authId, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long userId)
      Activates the authorization.
      Parameters:
      authId - the ID of the authorization to activate
      userId - the ID of the user requesting the activation
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the activated AuthDTO

    • updateAuthorization

      @PutMapping("/authorization") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthDTO> updateAuthorization(@RequestBody VisitorAuthRequest visitorAuthRequest, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long userId)
      Update authorization list with new authorized ranges.
      Parameters:
      visitorAuthRequest - new authorization details.
      userId - the ID of the user requesting the activation
      Returns:
      the updated AuthDTO authorization.

    • deleteAllAuthsByDocNumber

      @DeleteMapping("/{docType}/{docNumber}/authorizations") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<AuthDTO>> deleteAllAuthsByDocNumber(@PathVariable Long docNumber, @PathVariable DocumentType docType, @RequestHeader("x-user-id") Long userId)
      deletes all authorizations by document number.
      Parameters:
      docNumber - of the visitor.
      docType - of the visitor.
      userId - ID of the user requesting the deletion.
      Returns:
      list of authorizations deleted.
